conversation.content: 请给我几篇图像分割领域的论文

根据您的需求，Epp论文助手检索到了【119】篇论文，其主要分布在【2020】到【2023】之间，其中【2020】这一年的论文数量最多，有【43】篇论文,显示出近几年在该领域的研究活跃度较高。
这些论文主要围绕图像处理、计算机视觉和深度学习等领域进行研究，探讨了多种问题，并得出了一系列结论，表现出该领域的特点和趋势。具体包括：

1. 图像恢复与重建：如Unified Shape and SVBRDF Recovery using Differentiable Monte Carlo Rendering、Deep Image Deblurring: A Survey、A Survey on Image Deblurring、Domain Adaptation for Image Dehazing等。

2. 图像识别与分类：如ImageSig: A signature transform for ultra-lightweight image recognition、Multi-Scale Weight Sharing Network for Image Recognition、CNNs for JPEGs: A Study in Computational Cost、Estimating Extreme 3D Image Rotation with Transformer Cross-Attention等。

3. 图像生成与风格化：如Mixture of Diffusers for scene composition and high resolution image generation、A Closer Look at Few-shot Image Generation、Realization RGBD Image Stylization等。

4. 自动驾驶与感知：如Recur, Attend or Convolve? On Whether Temporal Modeling Matters for Cross-Domain Robustness in Action Recognition、Real-time Full-stack Traffic Scene Perception for Autonomous Driving with Roadside Cameras等。

5. 图像分析与处理：如Two new parameters for the ordinal analysis of images、Feature Extraction, Classification and Prediction for Hand Hygiene Gestures with KNN Algorithm、GLPanoDepth: Global-to-Local Panoramic Depth Estimation等。

6. 少样本学习与图像识别：如DIRL: Domain-Invariant Representation Learning for Sim-to-Real Transfer、Algebra and Geometry of Camera Resectioning等。

7. 视频景深估计与图像增强：如Feature Extraction, Classification and Prediction for Hand Hygiene Gestures with KNN Algorithm、Image Augmentation for Multitask Few-Shot Learning: Agricultural Domain Use-Case等。
